errors.error_description: The installation command is incomplete. It installs the base 'pyats' package but omits the '[full]' extra, which is required to install all components including genieparser.
correction_candidates: $ pip install pyats && pip install genie

errors.error_description: The development setup commands are in the wrong order. 'make develop' is executed before changing into the 'genieparser' directory, which will cause the command to fail.
correction_candidates:
bash$ cd genieparser
bash$ make develop
errors.golden_answer:
bash$ cd genieparser
bash$ make develop

errors.error_description: The file path provided for the changelog template in the text is incorrect ('changelog/templates/template.rst'), while the hyperlink points to the correct location. This can cause confusion for users trying to find the file locally.
